hero.title: Governance
hero.subtitle: Participate in decisions that shape SafeGard's future. Decentralized, transparent and auditable on-chain voting.

empty.title: No proposals found

deposit.title: Deposit Guarantee
deposit.confirmDescription: Review your deposit details before confirming.

warning.title: Important
warning.description: This deposit will be locked for 5 years as project guarantee.

processing.title: Processing Deposit
processing.description: Your transaction is being processed on the blockchain.
processing.note: This may take a few minutes. Do not close this window.

success.title: Deposit Completed
success.description: Your deposit has been completed successfully!

vote.title: Vote on Proposal
vote.alreadyVoted: You have already voted on this proposal
vote.expiredDescription: The voting period for this proposal has ended.

warning.title: Attention
warning.description: Your vote cannot be changed after confirmation.

processing.title: Processing Vote
processing.description: Your vote is being recorded on the blockchain.
processing.note: This may take a few minutes. Do not close this window.

success.title: Vote Recorded
success.description: Your vote has been recorded successfully!

status.liquidatedDescription: This project has been liquidated and you can claim your share of the vault.
status.completedDescription: This project has been completed successfully.
status.pausedDescription: This project has been paused by governance.
status.unknownDescription: The status of this project could not be determined.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: By claiming, you return project tokens and receive your proportional share of the guarantee vault.

warning.title: Irreversible Action
warning.description: This action cannot be undone. Make sure of the amounts before confirming.

processing.title: Processing Claim
processing.description: Your claim is being processed on the blockchain.
processing.note: This may take a few minutes. Do not close this window.

success.title: Claim Completed
success.description: Your claim has been processed successfully!

hero.title: The first decentralized guarantee protocol for Web3
hero.subtitle: More security and transparency for Lunes ecosystem investors. Segregated vaults, annual governance and public Guarantee Score (0–100) auditable on-chain.

howItWorks.title: How SafeGard Works
howItWorks.description: A transparent and decentralized guarantee system for Web3 projects

1.title: Project Registration
1.description: Projects deposit guarantees in segregated vaults with LUNES and other tokens

2.title: Community Governance
2.description: Annual voting with high quorums (≥75%) and 60-day correction windows

3.title: Guarantee Score
3.description: Public score (0-100) based on vault composition and project history

benefits.title: Investor benefits in the Lunes ecosystem
benefits.protection: Protection layer: if a project is liquidated, you return the project token and claim your share of the vault per the rules.
benefits.transparency: Radical transparency: Score 0–100 and vault metrics on-chain.
benefits.alignment: Long-term alignment: 5-year lock reduces short-term opportunism.
benefits.quality: Quality gate: High quorums (≥ 75% "Yes") + 60-day windows for course-correction.
benefits.comparability: Comparability: a single standard to assess risk across projects.
benefits.discipline: Execution discipline: annual governance + public event trail.

disclaimer.text: On-chain protocol. Vault donations have no redemption. For claims, you must return the project token. Crypto carries high risk—you may lose part or all of your value. Not financial advice.

projects.title: Choose with data—not hype
projects.subtitle: Filter by status, Score, vault size, and period. Compare apples to apples.

empty.title: No projects found
empty.description: Try adjusting your filters or search.

calculator.title: Score Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Simulate your project's guarantee score based on the parameters below

meta.title: Guarantee Score - SafeGard | Transparent Scoring System
meta.description: Understand how SafeGard's Score v1.1 works: a transparent algorithm that evaluates projects from 0-100 based on LUNES guarantees, asset diversity, and burn progress.

hero.title: Guarantee Score
hero.subtitle: Transparent and auditable system that evaluates project reliability based on deposited guarantees

ranges.title: Score Ranges
ranges.subtitle: Understand what each score range represents for project reliability

excellent.label: Excellent
excellent.description: Consolidated project with a robust and diversified vault

fair.label: Fair
fair.description: Growing project with vault under development

components.title: Score Components
components.subtitle: Score v1.1 is calculated based on two main components

lunes.title: LUNES Component
lunes.description: Score based on the amount of LUNES tokens deposited (mandatory)
lunes.details: LUNES is mandatory for any score. The calculation considers burn progress and project size to dynamically adjust requirements.

other.title: Other Assets
other.description: Additional score for PSP22 tokens and NFTs with haircuts applied
other.details: PSP22 tokens have a 90% haircut, NFTs have a 50% haircut. Contribution limited to 5 points to encourage focus on LUNES.

factors.title: Adjustment Factors
factors.subtitle: Elements that dynamically influence the score calculation

burn.title: Burn Progress
burn.description: Reduces requirements as LUNES tokens are burned from supply

project.title: Project Size
project.description: Larger projects require proportionally more guarantees

temporal.title: Temporal Adjustment
temporal.description: Combines burn progress with the project's base requirements

examples.title: Practical Examples
examples.subtitle: See how different scenarios result in different scores

nft.description: Project with NFTs and additional tokens increasing the score

staking.description: Project with LUNES locked in staking increasing reliability

new.description: New project with initial guarantees, evolving score

cta.title: Explore Projects by Score
cta.description: Use the Guarantee Score to make informed decisions about projects in the Lunes ecosystem
